title: A promising start
comment: Slick interface, easy to use. Discovered all my DLNA servers incl 3 Synologys. Unfortunately DroidUpnp cannot detect Chromecast, dlna tv, or local renderers like VLC or MX Player.
Last published version was not working for no apparent reason, this should be fixed now.

title: So/:
comment: Has some issues receive/transmit from/to an adhoc/hotspot android also cannt play on local players  ,fix,ip feature?

title: Joseph
comment: Good application a must download try it.

title: Simple & Open Source
comment: The *only* feature I want is to automatically play next song after current song finishes.  (I'm using this to play music off my phone through my raspberry pi speakers, but I'm having to manually click on next song when one finishes.)  I'm thankful this is on the F-Droid repository.

title: Works
comment: I only have BubbleUPnP Android media server. Can play Google music through this but no advantage I can see compared with just using BubbleUPnP

title: Very clean and works well.
comment: This is the cleanest, simplest UPnP app I have found for Android and it works well. Many others have nice features such as playlist support, but as a result they are way too complex when you just want to put some music playing on a device and have it play reliably. The only thing missing for me is the ability to list audio files by track number rather than alphabetically. This would push it up to 5 stars for me.

title: Not working
comment: Nothing happens with my Philips Smart Tv...
Do you see your TV in the second list of the left panel ? If you see it, what do you mean by nothing happens ? Did you try to play a media from your phone or an UPnP server ?

title: Works nicely!
comment: It's open source and it works great for streaming music and video.

title: Limited
comment: No remote server functionality. Cannot add devices by ip.

First, thanks for taking some time to write a review.
What do you mean by remote server ?
This application is made for UPnP/DLNA compatible device. UPnP/DLNA is designed with an automatic discovery service, so every compatible device should be discover automatically. Adding a device by IP is not needed.
